query:
UPDATE
                http_trigger
            SET
                wrap_body = $1,
                raw_string = $2,
                authentication_resource_path = $3,
                script_path = $4,
                path = $5,
                is_flow = $6,
                mode = $7,
                http_method = $8,
                static_asset_config = $9,
                edited_by = $10,
                email = $11,
                request_type = $12,
                authentication_method = $13,
                summary = $14,
                description = $15,
                edited_at = now(),
                is_static_website = $16,
                error_handler_path = $17,
                error_handler_args = $18,
                retry = $19
            WHERE
                workspace_id = $20 AND
                path = $21
